title: The M3 MacBook Air drops to its new best price ever ahead of Prime Day
content:
Macworld

As a treat just ahead of Prime Day, the Apple MacBook Air M3 is now available for $899 at Amazon, down from its MSRP of $1,099, marking the best price we’ve seen yet for this model.

This super portable laptop is powered by the blazing-fast M3 chip, which means it will effortlessly handle both work and play. When we reviewed this new Macbook we said it was “simply the best, but better.” Not only did we give it a whooping 4.5 stars, but also the Editors’ Choice award.

“The MacBook Air gets a nice performance boost, thanks to the M3 chip upgrade. The new dual external display support is a compromise, but it’s a welcome change in production environments. Overall, the M3 MacBook Air succeeds in continuing in its role as the laptop for everyone,” concluded our expert, Roman Loyola

This laptop is less than half an inch thick and super light, which means you can take it with you anywhere you go. The 18 hours of battery life ensures you won’t be left without power even if you forget the charger at home. The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display is also drop-dead gorgeous, supporting 1 billion colors and delivering a brilliant visual experience. Whether you need the laptop for work or fun, it will deliver just what you need. Participating in video calls is easy enough since there’s a 1080p HD camera built-in, as well as three microphones and four speakers.

So, take advantage of this deal right away and get the Apple MacBook Air M3 for just $899. Given how this seems to be an early Prime Day deal, chances are we won’t see this price again for a long while.
